name: The Mysterious Mrs. Valentine
description:
Why did she leave?                      Who is she with?                                         Is she coming back?

Ninita Valentine is missing. Her son is following the trail she left behind. What he finds is up to you.

  • Speak with strangers met on the supernatural Seascape to learn more about the mystery.
  • Use the clues you discover to decide for yourself what happened - and how you feel about it.
  • Take a screenshot of your dynamically-generated missing person report and compare with friends.

Estimated playtime: 15 - 20 minutes.

For more stories in this world, visit Three Scapes.

Credits

Direction, programming, and art - Ziba Scott
Writing and sound effects - Stephen Kelly
Music and general support - Bryan Kelly
